title: Awakened
description: His golden eyes mesmerized... how could a stranger like Lucien invoke so much desire in her? Chandler was a beautiful woman who was sensible, staid and in control--that was before she met hypnotically stunning and incredibly magnetic Lucien. She'd just recovered from a break up, so that's maybe the reason why she would ignite like dry wood on fire when his hands touched her skin. His kisses branded her, and when she refused him it left both of them terribly frustrated. And someone's been watching her... she felt it, she was sure of it. But who? There were also her incredible wet dreams about making love with someone she knew but she couldn't see... things were happening to Chandler that she couldn't explain. In Lucien's arms, she was becoming someone she didn't know.Or someone she couldn't remember? It was as if he was waking her up from the slumber of a powerful curse. It was as if he was making her remember. But could she dare believe?Can't stand the suspense? Download to find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable. This includes sex and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
